FSC.Title: Simple Calendar
FSC.DateFormat.Title: Format Tokens
FSC.DateFormat.Description: A list of the different formatting tokens to use in the format settings below.
FSC.DateFormat.Year.Name: Year name, as determined by the year name settings.
FSC.DateFormat.Year.Prefix: Year prefix as defined in the Year Prefix setting.
FSC.DateFormat.Year.Postfix: Year postfix as defined in the Year Postfix setting.
FSC.DateFormat.Month.NumberPadded: Months number padded with a zero.
FSC.DateFormat.Month.AbbreviatedName: The months abbreviated name as defined in the months settings.
FSC.DateFormat.Month.Name: The months full name as defined in the months settings.
FSC.DateFormat.Day.NumberPadded: Day number padded with a zero.
FSC.DateFormat.Day.NumberSuffix: Day number appended with its suffix.
FSC.DateFormat.Weekday.Number: The number for the day of the week.
FSC.DateFormat.Weekday.NumberPadded: The number for the day of the week padded with a zero.
FSC.DateFormat.Weekday.AbbreviatedName: The abbreviated name for the day of the week.
FSC.DateFormat.Weekday.Name: The full name for the day of the week.
FSC.DateFormat.Hour.12Hour: The hours number in the 12 hour format.
FSC.DateFormat.Hour.24Hour: The hours number in the 24 hour format
FSC.DateFormat.Hour.12HourPadded: The hours number padded with a zero in the 12 hour format.
FSC.DateFormat.Hour.24HourPadded: The hours number padded with a zero in the 24 hour format.
FSC.DateFormat.Hour.ampm: The am/pm indicator for the 12 hour time format in lowercase.
FSC.DateFormat.Hour.AMPM: The AM/PM indicator for the 12 hour time format in uppercase.
FSC.DateFormat.Minute.NumberPadded: The minutes number padded with a zero.
FSC.DateFormat.Second.NumberPadded: The seconds number padded with a zero.
FSC.DateFormat.TextDescription: For any text that should be in the format but not processed place square brackets around it.
FSC.DateFormat.Documentation: For more details about configuring date formats please check out the documentation or expand the table above.
FSC.DateControlsHelp: Use these controls to change the current date in your game.
FSC.NoDateControls: Simple Calendar has been configured to let another module control the date and time. Please use that module to update the time or change Simple Calendars configuration.
FSC.SetCurrentDateDialog.Title: Confirm Current Date Change
FSC.SetCurrentDateDialog.Content:
You have selected to change the date to a day which is not currently visible!
Are you sure you want to change the current date to {DATE}?
FSC.DeleteConfirmText: Do you really want to delete this note?
FSC.OverwriteConfirmText: Applying this change will overwrite all existing calendar configurations. Are you sure?
FSC.Time.ControlsHelp: Select a unit of time to change then use the controls to advance or reduce that unit by 1 or 5.
FSC.Notes.Title: Note Title
FSC.Notes.DateHelp: The date the note is for.
FSC.Notes.PlayerVisibleHelp: If this note is visible by the players or not.
FSC.Notes.ReminderHelp: You will be reminded of this event.
FSC.Notes.RepeatingHelp: If this note repeats weekly, monthly, yearly or not at all.
FSC.Notes.DateTime.Title: Note Date/Time
FSC.Notes.DateTime.Help: The date of the note and optionally the time of day the note occurs.
FSC.Notes.Author: Author
FSC.Configuration.Title: Calendar Configuration
FSC.Configuration.Description: This form allows you to customize your games calendar by specifying the current year, how many months, the name of each month and how many days each month has.
FSC.Configuration.Help: For help configuring the calendar be sure to check out the documentation!
FSC.Configuration.General.Title: General Settings
FSC.Configuration.General.PreDefinedHelp: Choose from one of the predefined calendars to start set up quicker.
FSC.Configuration.General.GameWorldTimeH: Tell the Simple calendar how to integrate itself with the game world time and respond to game world time updates.
FSC.Configuration.General.None: None: Does not tie into the game world time.
FSC.Configuration.General.Self: Self: Control the game world time ignoring updates from other modules.
FSC.Configuration.General.ThirdParty: Third Party Module: Only follows game world time updates from other modules.
FSC.Configuration.General.Mixed: Mixed: Update the game world time and follow updates made from other modules.
FSC.Configuration.General.PF2ESyncHelp: This will force Simple Calendar to stay in sync with the built in Pathfinder 2E world time.
FSC.Configuration.General.ShowClockHelp: If to show the time clock below the calendar, if checked the controls for changing hours, minutes and seconds will also show.
FSC.Configuration.General.PlayerAddNotes: The checked roles will be able to add notes to the calendar.
FSC.Configuration.General.PlayerReorderN: The checked roles will be able to re-order notes on a day.
FSC.Configuration.General.ImportExport.S: For importing or exporting Simple Calendars current calendar configuration to share or load replicate in another world.
FSC.Configuration.General.Permissions.No: Here the permissions for various interactions with Simple Calendar can be adjusted based on Foundry roles. Game masters will always have these permissions.
FSC.Configuration.General.CalendarPlayer: The checked roles will be able to open Simple Calendar.
FSC.Configuration.General.PlayersChangeD: The checked roles will be able to change the date and time of Simple Calendar
FSC.Configuration.General.Display.DateFo: The format text used to put together the display text for a date.
The format text used to put together the display text for a time.
The format text used to put together the display text for just the month and year that appears at the top of the calendar view.
FSC.Configuration.Notes.Title: Note Settings
FSC.Configuration.NoteCategories.Name: Note Category Name
FSC.Configuration.NoteCategories.NameHel: The display name of this note category.
FSC.Configuration.NoteCategories.ColorHe: The color associated with the note category.
FSC.Configuration.Notes.NoteCategoriesHe: Select all of the different note categories associated with this note.
FSC.Configuration.Year.Title: Year Settings
FSC.Configuration.Year.CurrentHelp: The current year that the game is taking place in. This can also be changed with the Date Controls.
FSC.Configuration.Year.PrefixHelp: Text that appears before the year number.
FSC.Configuration.Year.PostfixHelp: Text that appears after the year number.
FSC.Configuration.Year.YearZeroHelp: This is the year that is considered to be year zero for calculating how much time has passed. This will generally not need to be changed.
FSC.Configuration.Year.YearNamesStartHel: The year that the first year name on the list starts.
FSC.Configuration.Year.YearNameBehaviour: How to determine the order of year names.
FSC.Configuration.Season.Name: Season Name
FSC.Configuration.Season.StartingDateHel: The month and day when this season starts every year.
FSC.Configuration.Season.ColorHelp: The color to associate with this season.
FSC.Configuration.Season.ColorCustomHelp: Set a custom hex value color for the season.
FSC.Configuration.Season.SunriseSunsetHe: The time of day the sun rises and sun sets for the first day of the season.
FSC.Configuration.Month.Title: Month Settings
FSC.Configuration.Month.Name: Month Name
FSC.Configuration.Month.NameHelp: The text name of this month.
FSC.Configuration.Month.DaysHelp: The number of days that make up this month.
FSC.Configuration.Month.IntercalaryHelp: If this month is to be considered an intercalary month or not.
FSC.Configuration.Month.AbbreviationHelp: The abbreviated text name of this month.
FSC.Configuration.Month.IntercalaryInclu: Include Intercalary Month in Day Calculations
If checked the intercalary month will be treated like a normal month for calculating the day of the week days fall on and the total days in a year but still be listed as an intercalary month.
FSC.Configuration.Month.DayOffsetHelp: The amount to offset the day's number by. Used if you want to start a month at 2 instead of 1
FSC.Configuration.Month.NumberHelp: The numeric representation of this month.
FSC.Configuration.Month.StartingWeekDayH: Choose which day of the week this month will always start on, or leave as default to let the calendar figure out the appropriate weekday.
FSC.Configuration.Weekday.Title: Weekday Settings
FSC.Configuration.Weekday.ShowHeadingsHe: If to show the weekday headings on the calendar.
FSC.Configuration.Weekday.Name: Weekday Name
FSC.Configuration.Weekday.NameHelp: The text name of this day of the week.
FSC.Configuration.Weekday.AbbreviationHe: The abbreviated text name of this day of the week.
FSC.Configuration.Weekday.FirstWeekDayHe: This sets the day of the week that the first day of year 0 starts on.
FSC.Configuration.DefaultNoteVisibilityH: For new notes, if by default the player visibility option is checked or not
FSC.Configuration.LeapYear.Title: Leap Year Settings
FSC.Configuration.LeapYear.RuleHelp: The rules to follow when determining leap years.
FSC.Configuration.LeapYear.CustomModHelp: Every x number of years is a leap year.
FSC.Configuration.LeapYear.Days: Number of Days in a Leap Year
FSC.Configuration.LeapYear.DaysHelp: The number of days that make up this month during a leap year.
FSC.Configuration.Time.Title: Time Settings
FSC.Configuration.Time.HoursInDayHelp: How many hours make up a single day.
FSC.Configuration.Time.MinutesInHourHelp: How many minutes make up a single hour.
FSC.Configuration.Time.SecondsInMinuteHe: How many seconds make up a single minute.
FSC.Configuration.Time.SecondsInCombatRo: How many seconds pass during 1 round of combat. This is only applied if the current system does not increment time during combat rounds!
FSC.Configuration.Time.GameTimeRatio: Game Seconds Per Real Life Seconds
FSC.Configuration.Time.GameTimeRatioHelp: How many seconds pass in game for every second that passes in real time.
FSC.Configuration.Time.UpdateFrequencyHe: This determines how often the clock updates.
FSC.Configuration.Time.UnifyGameAndClock: Unify Clock Start/Pause With Game Pause
Ties the clocks start/pause button with the games pause/unpause option
FSC.Configuration.Moon.Title: Moon Settings
FSC.Configuration.Moon.Name: Moon Name
FSC.Configuration.Moon.CycleLengthHelp: The length of the lunar cycle in days. Accepts decimals.
FSC.Configuration.Moon.CycleAdjustmentHe: The amount of days to adjust the calculation by when determining the current phase.
FSC.Configuration.Moon.ColorHelp: The color to associate with this moon.
FSC.Configuration.Moon.PhaseNameHelp: The name of this phase of the moon.
FSC.Configuration.Moon.PhaseLengthHelp: How long the phase lasts in days.
FSC.Configuration.Moon.PhaseSingleDayHel: If this moon phase should only happen on 1 day.
FSC.Configuration.Moon.PhaseIconHelp: The icon to associate with this moon phase.
FSC.Configuration.Moon.YearResetHelp: If the year for the reference moon should reset and if so when it does.
FSC.Configuration.Moon.YearResetLeap: Reset reference year every leap year
FSC.Configuration.Moon.YearResetX: Reset reference year every X years
FSC.Configuration.Moon.YearXHelp: Reset the reference new moons year every x number of years.
FSC.Configuration.Moon.YearHelp: The year of a new moon to use as a reference.
FSC.Configuration.Moon.MonthHelp: The month of a new moon to use as a reference.
FSC.Configuration.Moon.DayHelp: The day of a new moon to use as a reference.
FSC.Warn.Time.ActiveCombats: There is an active combat/combats running, please resolve them before starting the real time clock.
FSC.Warn.Notes.NotGM: There is no GM present in the game, a GM needs to be logged in for players to add notes.
FSC.Warn.Macros.GMUpdate: Only the GM can update the calendar date!
FSC.Warn.Calendar.NotGM: There is no GM present in the game, a GM needs to be logged in for players to change the date/time.
FSC.Error.Note.NoTitle: Can't save a note with no title!
FSC.Error.Note.RichText: Please save the rich editor content.
FSC.Error.Note.NoSelectedDay: Unable to add new note, there is no selected day.
FSC.Error.Note.NoSelectedMonth: Unable to add new note, there is no selected month.
FSC.Error.Calendar.GMConfigure: You need to be a GM to configure the calendar.
FSC.Error.Calendar.GMCurrent: You need to be a GM to change the current date.
FSC.Module.CalendarWeather.Title: Calendar/Weather Module Detected!
FSC.Module.CalendarWeather.Configuration:
We have detected that the Calendar/Weather module is enabled for this world.

If you would like to import the Calendar/Weather calendar settings into Simple Calendar choose "Import Into Simple Calendar", this will make the Simple Calendar match the Calendar/Weather settings.

If you would like to make Calendar/Weather match Simple Calendar choose "Export Into Calendar/Weather", this will make the Calendar/Weather settings match the Simple Calendars configuration.
FSC.Module.AboutTime.Title: About-Time Module Detected
FSC.Module.AboutTime.Configuration.Messa:
We have detected that the about-time module is/has been enabled for this world.

If you would like to import the about-time calendar settings into Simple Calendar choose "Import Into Simple Calendar", this will make the Simple Calendar match the about-time settings.

If you would like to make about-time match Simple Calendar choose "Export Into About-Time", this will make the about-time settings match the Simple Calendars configuration.
FSC.Importer.NoFile: Please Select a file to import.
FSC.Importer.InvalidSCConfig: Invalid file uploaded, please upload a Simple Calendar exported JSON file.
